name: Cantinflas Simulator Tres Mil
description:
Simulate High Performance Choreography from the film El Bolero de Raquel Featuring The One and Only Cantinflas!

Uh, well not actually Cantinflas since the summoning didn't take..

But I got a red dress, denim jacket, and a camera so let's get it!

Originally Developed for Dallas Society of Play's Cartridge Jam 3

Cartoon Character Art by Jeff Pennington

Game Controls:

Escape Key - Quit Game

F Key  - Skip Scene

Left Mouse Click  to Interact With Buttons
